act:act.act:title: Municipal Act
act:act.act:repealedtext:
[Title changed to Local Government Act by the Local Government Statutes
Amendment Act, 2000, SBC2000, c. 7, s. 1, effective June 12, 2000 (Royal Assent).
Most of the Local Government Act revised under the Statute
Revision Act, effective January 1, 2016 (B.C. Reg. 257/2015). See the Local
Government Act, RSBC2015, c. 1.
The unrevised portion of the Local Government Act retitled as the
Municipal Replotting Act by the Revision Schedule to the Local Government Act,
RSBC2015, c. 1, effective January 1, 2016 (on coming into force of RSBC2015, c. 1).
See the Municipal Replotting Act, RSBC1996, c. 323.]
